name: Losser Mirklav

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
text: Losser can move through the space of a creature that is a size bigger than him.

trait.name: Brave
text: Losser has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
• 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, fireball, fly

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield, misty step, suggestion, animate dead, fireball, fly, blight, ice storm, cone of cold
description:
A halfling necromancer who is in possession of the Stone of Golorr. He lives in a cellar complex under a powdered wig shop in the Trades Ward.
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 85
